title: Emerald Bloom Drop Earrings - Contemporary Jhumka Design
features: These earrings feature a delicate floral design accentuated with round cut diamonds. A single emerald cut emerald forms the drop. The design is a modern interpretation of the classic Jhumka silhouette, offering a blend of tradition and contemporary style. These are set in prong setting. The back is fitted with screw and post. The design draws inspiration from floral motifs.
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Diwali
or any special event. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to formal gatherings and parties.
description: These earrings boast an exquisite blend of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The exceptional emerald and diamond quality adds to its timeless appeal. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear. The rose gold metal adds a modern touch to the timeless emerald and diamond combination.
